init.description: Submit the zone and distance which you want to use.

data.device_key: Device Key of the Miles Car API, extracted from your phone or automatically generated.
data.scan_interval: The interval in minutes to scan for new data.
data.location: The location used to check for available cars around the location.
data.distance_meters: The distance in meters to search for cars around the location.
data.type_limit: The types of cars which should be returned.
data.electric_only: Filter to only return electric cars.
data.gas_only: Filter to only return cars which are not electric.

user.description: Submit the zone and distance which you want to use.

data.device_key: Device Key of the Miles Car API, extracted from your phone or automatically generated.
data.scan_interval: The interval in minutes to scan for new data.
data.location: The location used to check for available cars around the location.
data.distance_meters: The distance in meters to search for cars around the location.
data.type_limit: The types of cars which should be returned.
data.electric_only: Filter to only return electric cars.
data.gas_only: Filter to only return cars which are not electric.

error.location_invalid: The location is invalid. Only zones, persons and device_trackers can be used.
error.location_not_found: The location could not be found.

user.description: Submit your train station details and calendar entries for the search queries.
